entry.title: Thursday night: A few clouds. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Fog patches developing overnight. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Thursday 23 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of light snow. High minus 3. POP 30%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness early in the morning. 30 percent chance of light snow in the afternoon. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind becoming north 20 km/h in the afternoon. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 15 in the morning and minus 7 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Thursday 23 March 2023
